ygData.messageBody:
personally....i would say they should get credit for the exp they've gained
after. if it changes color it sounds like its going through making it
harder each time for the exp to gain....which is exactly what happens to us
in lvls....so its fair if they jumped to 53 or 60 etc.


And just for your knowledge....i used to play a few muds....on one...called
MajorMud, when this same problem came up.....people didnt shoot up ten
lvls....they shot up about 2 maybe 3....and this was after MONTHS of work.
They made sure it didnt happen, because an extreme unbalance can happen.
